title: Bug 113047: Children nodes not listed when changing data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab
description: When changing the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab, no children nodes are listed even when a new data source is selected. This behavior is unexpected.
OB: No children nodes are listed when changing the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab.
EB: When changing the data source, the new data source's children should be listed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the dataset editor page of the query tab.
2. Select a dataset.
3. Click on the option to change the data source.
4. Select a different data source.
5. Check if the children nodes of the new data source are listed.
